participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: down-to-earth and practical, enjoys quiet moments with dogs and books.
participant_1.background: i do not care about fashion. i hate the color orange. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i compete in dog agility classes.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: ambitious and outgoing, loves sports and is dedicated to academics.
participant_2.background: my current goal is to run a k. i make straight as in school. i won homecoming queen this year. when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist. i am currently in high school.

content.text: i am doing well . i just got back from the gym .
